content: A normal user is able to send the invite to another email id but is not able to view his list of invitations. Is it actually the way it is or should we add one link to access our list of invites?
From invites I mean, the number of invitations we have sent from our account
@Arunika Yadav Are you able to see any UI here? (We have a UI for admins to review invitations in settings somewhere.)

Ah, I don't believe you can as a non-admin user. Here's what the invite UI looks like for an admin. (I'm using "iago" in the dev environment here, where "iago" is our test admin user):

image.png

I think it would be reasonable to provide the same UI to non-admin users. Obviously they would only see their own invitations.

Feel free to open an issue here.
Sure @Steve Howell Thanks for confirming.

https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/14007 I am unable to create this issue that I created while I have no other issue to work on. I guess it needs to be marked help_wanted or good first issue. I have two pull requests under review and meanwhile I can start to work on this one.
If zulipbot is preventing you from assigning it to yourself, you can always just add a comment that you're working on it to try to prevent duplicate work.
